Name: WhiTaers
About the game: This is a visual novel about 20 minutes in length, telling a story of memories. The story consists of two weeks and eight clues overlapping each other. It tells the world of male masters' memories and reality. WhiTaers is a story about the protagonist looking for himself from being lost. When did people start to lose themselves? The new journey of confusion has begun.
